text: .@swapan55: Indian media's squeamishness about reporting Muslim mob violence in Malda encourages further outbreaks. http://www.asianage.com/editorial/why-nation-fell-silent-kaliachak-708 …

@raghav355 Interesting piece. Curious why you didn't include Malda/Murshidabad in Bengal, and perhaps Kishanganj in Bihar, in your analysis?
